response.overview: Victims of a cyber attack contend with living off the grid, but when their safe haven is compromised a crisis of conscience threatens the group's survival. In a world where technology has become fatal to use, what would happen to society as we know it? How would people react? And would survival outweigh our own humanity? I Am Nowhere is a short dystopian thriller written by Sam Adams. Set in the months after a cyber attack renders technology fundamentally dangerous people have taken to living in remote locations and all but cut it out from their lives.
response.title: I am Nowhere
